jdx/mise

Dev tool version manager and task runner for multiple languages

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • open source multi-agent framework for automating tasks like code, reports, and docs
  • version control tool, works with Git repos, tracks code changes
  • multi-language package manager and workflow tool, works with conda, per-project or global installs
  • Java JIT compiler built on LLVM
  • gitignore templates for different languages, build tools, IDEs
  • run code in 25+ languages from one CLI
  • Translation platform for software projects, connects with version control, manages localization files
  • Open source platform for developing, monitoring, and debugging LLM apps
  • JVM language decompiler with Java 21+ support
